column5: Just wondering if anyone here carpools from Niagara area to Burlington.
Nope sorry.. I walk 18' to work.. but consider it a bump..
Nice....I am not going to work thou.  I am going back to school after 13 years.  I was just trying to maybe cut some costs coming from Fort Erie to Burlington.
Good for you.. good luck finding a ride. Someone's gotta be makin the trek. Try the local shoppers news for a free advert as well.
